title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: Red car driving on a busy city street with multiple other vehicles and pedestrians.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving on a busy city street with multiple other vehicles and pedestrians. The road is wet, and there are tall buildings on both sides. The traffic light is green, and there is a parked truck on the right side of the road. The weather is clear, and the sky is blue.
reasoning: The red car is driving at moderate speed, following the flow of traffic. It slows down and brakes frequently due to the busy nature of the city street. The driver needs to be cautious and attentive to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. The parked truck on the right side of the road could also pose a potential obstacle for the driver to navigate around.
